articles.author: Tory Shepherd
articles.title: Friday night Australian east coast solar storm could lead to spectacular light show - The Guardian
articles.description: An enormous coronal hole opening on the sun, sending charged particles to Earth, will potentially cause auroras – and a range of technical issues
articles.content:
A massive solar storm, set to peak on Friday night, could lead to a spectacular light show across Australias eastern coast.
But scientists have also warned the opening of an enormous coronal hole on… [+3527 chars]
